ComicInfo.Summary:
"BURN BABY BURN," Part Two
From RODNEY BARNES, the writer behind such hit shows as Marvel’s ​Runaways​ and STARZ’s ​American Gods,​ and JASON SHAWN ALEXANDER, the artist who redefined ​SPAWN​, comes a horror tale that will shake you to your core! Jimmy Sangster’s worst nightmare returns when Abigail unleashes the most vicious vampire the world has ever seen. Meanwhile, James Sangster Sr. must traverse the afterlife if he’s to be reunited with his wife’s spirit…but will the ferryman of the underworld help or is he pulling Sangster deeper into Hell?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Jason Shawn Alexander & Luis NCT | 1 | | B | Cover B | Bill Sienkiewicz | 2 |
